name: Data Link Notifier
description: A small icon on notification bar to ensure if the data link is *REALLY* connected. Also shows your connection speed level. (On Android 2.2+ devices)  Almost drains no battery, no traffic when screen is off.  Default pings 8.8.8.8 every 3 seconds, about 2 KB/min traffic when screen is on. You can change these settings.  Icon is from http://www.rubysoftware.nl/  Containing: Copyright 2011 Robot Media SL (http://www.robotmedia.net) Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the License); you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
